DOC.brief_summary: Study rate progress labor among nulliparous woman belong different body mass index group , & observe variation maternal body mass index may affect course labor .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Maternal Body Mass Index Labor Progress Nulliparous Women
DOC.detailed_description: For nulliparous case present labor ward , maternal height & weight collect time admission calculate BMI ( body mass index ) & classify accord WHO ( World Health Organization ) category . Putting consideration physiological increase BMI related pregnancy , overweight participant whose BMI ( 25-29.9 ) combine normal range BMI ( 18.5-24.9 ) category . Labor characteristic participant compare underweight ( BMI less 18.5 ) & obese ( BMI 30 high ) participants.Females assign one 3 group base BMI ; Underweight group ( BMI < 18.5kg/m2 ) , Control group whose BMI within normal range ( 18.5-29.9 kg/m2 ) , & Obese group ( BMI equal 30kg/m2 ) . Labor management protocol fix . Data labor progression collect , include cervical dilatation , cervical effacement , head station & descent . The median duration labor , estimate rate cervical dilatation cm , use measurement labor progression group . A cesarean section abnormal labor pattern document failure progress .
DOC.criteria: nulliparous woman active phase labor , age range 20 40 year . Full term pregnancy , singleton , viable fetus , cephalic ( vertex ) presentation , occipitoanterior position . Multiparous woman . Preterm labor . Passed date delivery . Multiple gestation . Large fetal weight ( 4000g ) . Intrauterine fetal death . Intrauterine fetal growth restriction . Major fetal congenital anomaly . Rupture membranes onset active labor . Fetal malposition malpresentation . Inadequate pelvis cephalopelvic disproportion . Maternal medical disorder . Induction labor oxytocin prostaglandin . Conditions require urgent delivery eg antepartum haemorrhage , fetal distress , cord prolapse .
